806620.name: GE Pioneer Support Box
806620.description:
GE - Pioneer Support Box
This package contains the following items:

  • Pet Food x100
  • Soul Crystal for Event x30
  • Total Status Ampule for Event x20
  • Triumph Potion (Event) x20
  • Progressive Nutrition (Event) x30
  • Progressive Mithridart (Event) x30
  • Progressive Stimulant (Event) x30
  • Progressive Painkiller (Event) x30
  • Event Enhanced Crystal Wing (15days) x1

* This package can be purchased only once. The Package and all of the items included cannot be traded with other players.
* Retrieve the item at the Leonardo Expreso NPC. Or, click “Shop” then select “Get Cash Item”.
* Non-refundable once used.
